### Publications

------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r,message=F,echo=F}
#| results: asis

library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(data.table)
library(here)

df<-readxl::read_xlsx(here("pubs","pubs.xlsx"))%>%
  data.table()
gluefun <- function(df) {
  glue('<span> {df$authors}. {df$year}. [{df$title}]({df$link}) {df$journal}.</span>
    <a 
    type="button"
    class="btn btn-primary-sm"
    data-bs-toggle="collapse"
    data-bs-target="#collapse{df$short_id}" 
    aria-expanded="false" 
    aria-controls="collapseExample"
    >
    Abstract
    </a> 
<div class="collapse" id="collapse{df$short_id}">
  <div class="card card-body">
    {df$abstract}
  </div>
</div><br>')%>%print()
}



for (i in 1:nrow(df[,.N,year])) {
  y<-df[,.N,year][order(year)][i,year]
  pubs_y<-df[year==y]
  print(glue(""))
  print(glue('#### {y}'))
  pubs_y[order(date)]%>%
    split(1:nrow(pubs_y))%>%
    walk(gluefun)
}
```
